description: An improved hood combined with leather, kevlar and blood compact sheet. The protection it used to provide has increased.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: XL blood infused survivor cargo pants

description: A pair of pants consisting of leather, kevlar and blood compact sheet, pouches and pockets are covered with excess materials for better protection. It is comfortable and warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Customize kevlar duster with sleeves improved with blood compact sheets for increased protection. The storage remains high.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL blood infused survivor gloves

description: Customized pair of kevlar, leather and blood sheet compact gloves. It provides protection in extreme situations.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

name.str: pair of XL blood infused survivor boots

description: Kevlar, leather and blood compact sheets arranged into the boots, granting maximum damage protection against all odds.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A trenchcoat built for both protection and storage using kevlar and blood compact sheet. Comfortable to wear.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
